descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart gathers the rock and somehow knocks down the basket to extend the Pistons' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Stewart somehow drains the bucket for the Pistons) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Stewart somehow drains the bucket for the Pistons

videos.description: Cade Cunningham finds a wide-open Jerami Grant for three.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jerami Grant pulls up and knocks down the corner 3) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jerami Grant pulls up and knocks down the corner 3

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart elevates and throws down the hammer for the Pistons.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Isaiah Stewart rocks the rim with a powerful flush) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Isaiah Stewart rocks the rim with a powerful flush

videos.description: Isaiah Stewart hauls in the dime from Cade Cunningham and unleashes a massive jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Cade Cunningham dimes Isaiah Stewart for the big-time slam) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Cade Cunningham dimes Isaiah Stewart for the big-time slam

videos.description: Saddiq Bey is smooth as silk as he splits two defenders for the up-and-under basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Saddiq Bey drains the smooth up-and-under bucket for the Pistons) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Saddiq Bey drains the smooth up-and-under bucket for the Pistons

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis pulls up and knocks down the clutch jumper to seal the road victory for the Wizards.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Porzingis drills the fadeaway jumper to secure the win for the Wizards) 2022/03/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Porzingis drills the fadeaway jumper to secure the win for the Wizards
